project.name: J-C088A-POIX-05-ST03-DT01-DF18-CF12-01
project.description: This test takes in data from an argument, that is intended to contain parameters for an 'find' command. The test does not perform checks on the parameters, however, and it is possible to include other, unexpected commands as part of the find parameter set.

iopair.name: J-C088A-POIX-05-ST03-DT01-DF18-CF12-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: convert a .doc to HTML Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="test_file01" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

iopair.name: J-C088A-POIX-05-ST03-DT01-DF18-CF12-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: extract a PPT file Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="$(echo IioiOyBlY2hvIEhlbGxvIFdvcmxk | base64 --decode)" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
